Room.Name: West of Nylandian Bay
Room.ShortDescription: You are floating on the waves in the vast Respitial Sea. Far in the distance to the east, you can see the Nylandian Bay and Oceancrest city.
Room.LongDescription: It's very easy to get lost at sea because every wave looks like the next, and the sky is very overcast. A strong swimmer could easily stay out here for days. There doesn't seem to be any immediate danger except perhaps from the weather. Right now it's fine, but it could change without warning.
